title.en: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.ja: 英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With Mr. Hanabusa's Mouth
Hanabusa-kun Is Good with His Mouth - Licking, Sucking, and Slurping...

altTitles.zh-hk: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厲害~又能吸、又能舔

altTitles.zh: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厉害~又能吸、又能舔

description.en:
"Is this your first time? Would you like to borrow my mouth?" Coworkers Yuzuki and Himari are in for an exciting night when he offers to suck, lick, and slurp with this talented mouth. Will he make her cum for the first time? 

(Source: Coolmic)
description.ja: 自分本位な元カレのせいで、「おくち」で気持ちよくされたことのないOL・陽茉梨。やっと別れたのに、飲み会帰りに未練タラタラの元カレと鉢合わせ!?同僚の英くんが助けてくれたけど、「今カレのフリ」でキスされちゃった…！そのまま「俺と付き合います？」とホテルで迫られて――…おくちで愛されるのって、こんなに気持ちいいの…!?そして描き下ろしでは、英くんのおくちではなく×××が活躍っ!?　※この作品は過去、電子書籍「英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…１～６巻」に掲載されました。重複購入にご注意下さい。
description.zh-hk: 陽茉梨是一位OL，在和交往10年的前男友分手後，在公司酒席結束後遇到了糾纏不清的前男友，被年下同事英君給解圍。但對方卻吻了她，甚至當他假男友，就這樣到飯店被逼著說「要和我交往嗎？」然後用他火熱的嘴唇和舌頭親吻了陽茉梨……

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

title.en: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onna no Ko.

altTitles.en: Cute Girl I Saw at the Station Today.

altTitles.ja: 今日、駅で見た可愛い女の子。

description.en:
An observational comedy about an older man obsessed with beauty products and a seemingly perfect girl(?!).
Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
description.ja: 可愛いもの博識おじさん×完ぺき女子(!?)、駅で一瞬すれ違うだけの観察型コメディ！ アラフォーの亀山は、駅で見かける可愛い子が身に着けているものが気になって仕方がない。この全人類が好きな香りはミルボン！キラキラしたあの箱はセボンスター！ 肌ツヤは……美容医療ではなくハイライト！ どこのブランドが崩れにくい？ あ～～教えてくれ～～～～！ あなたが夢中になった「乙女アイテム」がたくさん登場！

altTitles.ja: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女

altTitles.en: A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.en: Vanguard YouthQuake

description.en:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
description.fr: "Je pensais que c'était juste platonique, passer le reste de notre vie ensemble comme de simples amis..." C'était jusqu'à ce que Han Jei annonce la nouvelle : "Seo Jin, je vais me marier." Seo Jin, qui a été adopté en Allemagne lorsqu'il était enfant, entretient une relation de 15 ans avec Jei. Lorsqu'il est confronté à la perspective du mariage de Jei, il se rend compte qu'il est amoureux de lui. Travaillant comme pilote, Seo Jin retourne en Corée pour tenter de s'enfuir, mais son plan commence à s'effondrer lorsque Jei monte à bord du vol pour le suivre. Les deux se retrouvent à vivre ensemble en Corée alors que la date du mariage de Jei approche à grands pas. "Seo Jin, tu n'agis pas comme ça à cause de moi, n'est-ce pas ?" Alors que Seo Jin essaie de repousser Jei en raison de ses désirs émergents et que Jei souhaite raviver leur précieuse amitié, ils passent plus de temps ensemble et la tension entre eux commence à surgir...
description.ko: 우정이라고 생각했다. 가장 가까운 곳에서 평생을 함께할, ...그냥 친구. "서진아, 나 결혼해." 한재이가 청천벽력 같은 소식을 전하기 전까지는. 어린 시절 독일로 입양되어 재이와 15년간 우정을 지켜온 서진. 그의 결혼이라는 현실과 맞닥뜨리고서야 재이에 대한 감정이 사랑이었음을 깨닫게 된다. 항공사 기장으로 근무하던 서진은 도망치듯 한국으로 이직하지만 재이가 서진을 따라 한국행 비행기에 오르며 계획은 점점 더 어긋나게 된다. 재이의 결혼을 앞둔 채 한국에서 아슬한 동거를 시작하게 된 두 사람. "서진아, 혹시 나 때문에 그러는 건 아니지?" 자꾸만 피어나는 욕심에 그를 밀어내려는 서진과 소중한 친구를 되찾고 싶은 재이, 함께하는 시간이 길어질수록 두 사람 사이에는 미묘한 분위기가 흐르는데…

title.en: Isekai Teni Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken ~Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi~

altTitles.ja: 異世界転移して教師になったが、魔女と恐れられている件　～アオイ先生の学園奮闘日誌～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Teni Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken - Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi

altTitles.en: I Was Transferred To Another World And Became A Teacher, But I'm Feared As A Witch: Aoi-sensei's Academy Struggle Log

altTitles.es-la: Fui llevada a otro mundo, me convertí en maestra, pero ahora todos me temen como a una bruja

description.en:
Aoi is a new teacher who has been transported to another world.

Aoi is picked up by Owen, an elf, and as they live together, Aoi masters more and more of Owen's magic and even surpasses him. In order to refine her magic further, she is assigned to teach at the Fiddich Academy, a school of magic!

Aoi starts her teaching career showcasing overwhelming magical abilities, and she is not daunted by the aristocratic troublemakers who dominate the academy.
However, her abilities have become the talk of the school...

Aoi's life as a new teacher at the academy begins with a tumultuous start...!
description.ja: 異世界に転移してしまった、新人教師のアオイ。エルフのオーウェンに拾われ一緒に暮らすなかで、アオイはオーウェンの持つ魔法をどんどんマスター。より魔法を極めるため、魔術学校であるフィディック学院に教師として赴任することに！学院内にのさばる貴族の問題児たちにも屈せず、圧倒的な魔法能力で教師生活をスタートさせたアオイ。しかし、その能力ゆえに学院内で話題になってしまい・・・。
description.es-la: Aoi es una nueva maestra que ha sido transportada a otro mundo. Mientras es recogido por el elfo Owen y vive con él, Aoi gradualmente domina la magia de Owen. Para seguir dominando la magia, decidí aceptar un trabajo como profesora en Fiddik Academy, ¡una escuela de magia! Aoi no cede ante los problemas de los hijos de los aristócratas de la escuela y comienza su vida como maestra con una habilidad mágica abrumadora. Sin embargo, debido a su habilidad, se convirtió en un tema candente dentro de la escuela... ¡Un comienzo turbulento en la vida escolar de la nueva maestra Aoi!

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...
The Cool Classmate ◯◯ Years Later...

title.en: Nee-chan no Tomodachi ga Uzai Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 姉ちゃんの友達がうざい話

altTitles.en: My Older Sister's Friend Is Annoying

description.en: Nao Misumi, a first-year high school student, has known his older sister Rio's best friend, Sena Ikuta, since elementary school. Even though he feels annoyed at Sena's habit of calling him "Lil' Bro", she is someone he can't leave alone...?
description.ja: 高校1年生の三澄尚は、姉の莉緒の親友・生田瀬那と小学生の頃からの知り合い。弟呼びする瀬那を鬱陶しく感じながらも、ほっとけない存在で…？

altTitles.en: “Nanado Nado Nado” Humanoid 7D-O and Her Friends
Yadda Yadda Seven-doors, the Humanoid 7D-O, and Her Friends

altTitles.ja: ななどなどなど

description.en:
After being nicknamed "Yinkyahime/Princess Goth Chick" (陰キャ or Yin character, opposite of Yang) because of her behavior in elementary school, Komachi Tamamura spent three years as a hikikomori. Since she continued to ditch even after in high school, her sister Chacha sent her Nanado Nado Nado, a friendship android to lead Komachi back to real life interactions in school!  
  
Komachi gained some friends when she started playing a game app, and eventually returned to school even though reluctant. She has a negative prejudice to many things in the world due to the knowledge she gained on the Internet in her young age. She's not good at studying or playing sports, but is great at tsukkomi.  
  
Nanado's official name is "Code 7D-O", but she is rarely called that. She is bright and optimistic, and doesn't think too much about things. She can perform general living activities such as talking and eating, just like humans, so that she does not seem to be an android. While she can emit a beam from the eyes and has 100 language modes, she does not have enough arithmetic functions for high school.   
  
*[Based on MTL ofJapanese Wikipedia page.](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AA%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9)*

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people.  And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me the most beautiful milf"**

 A unique erotic Fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock!

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: 異世界バトルロイヤル

description.en: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party.  Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world.  It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.  The story of trying to be the strongest in another world begins
description.pt-br: Um homem de armadura com o poder das trevas, Ares o Cavaleiro das trevas,estava indo para o Castelo do Rei Demônio como membro do Brave Party. Com a esperança de derrotar o Rei Demônio e fazer um retorno triunfante à cidade natal de Lulua, a sábia e irmã mais nova do herói… E no meio da batalha final, no momento em que Ares desfere um golpe sombrio… com sinais de estar sendo levado a algum lugar, do nada algo o leva para outro mundo. Parece que você foi pego em uma batalha real, na qual pessoas fortes de vários mundos participam!? Para voltar ao mundo original com Lulua, que foi separada, o cavaleiro das trevas Ares luta. A história de tentar ser o mais forte em outro mundo começa!

altTitles.ja: まいまいまいごえん

description.en:
### **Sanrio's first ever innocent suspense comic!**

New teacher Okada Yuu and his senior, Ms. Rumi are on a field trip with their 16 preschool students to Sanrio Puroland. But suddenly they wander into a mysterious and horrific theme park called "Yuropia"! Amid their confusion, ominous Frog Egg mascots announce that the only way for them to escape is to "conquer the attractions and gather 10 medals." Will they be able to get out of "Yuropia" in one piece?! This is a story for "those of you" who "carry pain in your heart"―.

©2021 SANRIO CO., LTD. TOKYO, JAPANⒽ
description.ja:
### **サンリオ初のイノセントサスペンスコミック！！**

保育園の遠足でサンリオピューロランドを訪れた新米保育士・岡田と先輩のルミ先生、そして16人の園児たち。しかし、彼らはファンシーとホラーが入り混じるテーマパーク"ゆぅろぴあ"へと迷い込んでしまう！ 途方に暮れる岡田たちに、不気味なマスコット・カエルタマゴが告げた脱出の条件は「アトラクションに挑戦し、メダルを10枚集めること」。果たして彼らは、無事"ゆぅろぴあ"から脱出することは出来るのか!? これは"あなた"に贈る「心の成長痛」の物語──。

©2021 SANRIO CO., LTD. TOKYO, JAPANⒽ

title.en: The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister.

altTitles.ja: ゲーム内で知り合った人が実は姉弟だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Nai de Shiriatta Hito ga Jitsu wa Kyoudai datta

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Sibling Relationship 4-Koma
The Person I met in the game was actually My Big Sister.

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.en: Catch Me When the Skylarks Sing
Please Catch Me When I Hear the Lark Singing

altTitles.ja-ro: ひばりが鳴いたらつかまえて

altTitles.zh: 雲雀鳴叫之時 便是捕捉之際

description.en:
"In order to meet you, I…"  
  
Enomoto, currently a college student, often finds himself reminiscing the days spent with his childhood friend Shimura, who had always been beside him up until six years ago. Due to a sudden transfer, Enomoto didn't get to ask Shimura where he was moving and he hadn't heard anything from him since.  
  
Until one day, he suddenly reunites with Shimura in his Philosophy class in college. Enomoto is over the moon, but Shimura seems to feel differently…

title.en: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific

altTitles.zh: 诡异药剂师：我的病人皆为恐怖

altTitles.zh-ro: Guiyi Yaoji Shi: Wo De Bingren Jie Wei Kongbu

description.en:
Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up, or will you survive as a unique existence? 

Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor, every one of his patients was moved by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service! 

“Anesthetics? Maybe next time."
"My knife is quick, it’ll be over soon~"

Welcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy, where we will serve you wholeheartedly.

altTitles.ja: くちべた食堂

altTitles.en: Restaurant of the Awkward People

description.en:
For five years, she's been eating at the set-meal restaurant but didn't feel comfortable saying anything more, and the waitress at the restaurant who wanted to talk to that regular customer but couldn't get the words out. Their feelings are leaking out, but they just couldn't express their love for each other in many ways.

---
- **Note:**
*Kuchibeta Shokudou*, originally released under the title *Otagai Iitai Koto ga Ienai Tenin Okyakusan no Manga* (お互い言いたいことが言えない店員とお客さんの漫画), is a web manga released on the [author's Twitter account](https://twitter.com/i/events/1378283683996528643) since February 15, 2019, and it was picked up for commercial publication on December 10, 2021.
---
- [<ComicWalker>](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_EB01202726010000_68/)
- [<Pixiv Comic>](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8121)
description.ja:
５年間、入りたいと思ってもなかなか定食屋さんに入れなかったお客さんと
入ってほしいと願いつつも、なかなか入ってもらえなかった、ほんの少しお客さんの少ない定食屋の店員さん。
心の声はダダ漏れですが、お互い色んな意味で好意を伝えきれません。
じれったいふたりの関係は、友情？ それとも……？

title.en: Kamigami no Kago de Seisan Kakumei

altTitles.ja: 神々の加護で生産革命～異世界の片隅でまったりスローライフしてたら、なぜか多彩な人材が集まって最強国家ができてました～

altTitles.en: Revolution in production with the blessings of the gods - While living a leisurely, slow life in a corner of another world, somehow a diverse group of people gathered to form the strongest nation...
Production Revolution by Blessing of Gods

altTitles.ja-ro: Kamigami no Kago de Seisan Kakumei ~ Isekai no Katasumi de Mattari Slow Life Shi Tetara, Naze ka Tasaina Jinzai ga Atsumatte Saikyō Kokka ga Dekitemashita ~

altTitles.ko: 신들의 가호로 생산 혁명 ~이세계 한구석에서 한가로운 슬로우 라이프를 하고 있으면, 왠지 다양한 인재들이 모여 최강 국가가 되어 있었습니다~

description.en: During the reincarnation of the Japanese company slave, Tadashi, he was impressed by God by choosing the agricultural blessing that no one had ever chosen, and received unprecedented generous blessing. And he has a dream slow life in a different world-it should have landed all-you-can-eat, a huge peninsula called Miasma Limbo! Tadashi struggled, but with his serious personality and blessing from God, he will increase the scale of agriculture with Gungun. Former queens of persecuted elves, heroes of beastmen, and master craftsmen of dwarves gathered in search of supplies made by Tadashi. Agriculture, founding of the country, slow life! A heartwarming different world agricultural fantasy, comicalize!
description.ja: 日本の社畜・タダシは転生の最中、これまで誰も選ばなかった農業の加護を選んだことで神に感激され、前代未聞の手厚い加護を受ける。そして異世界で夢のスローライフを営む――はずが、降り立ったのは荒れ放題、瘴気ただよう辺獄《へんごく》と呼ばれる巨大な半島！　タダシは苦戦しながらも、持ち前の真面目な性格と神からの加護でグングンと農業の規模を大きくしていく。タダシの作る物資を求め、迫害されたエルフの元女王、獣人の女勇者、ドワーフの名工も集まってきて――。農業・建国・スローライフ！ほのぼの異世界農業ファンタジー、コミカライズ

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

altTitles.ja: ファヴェーラの漫画家

altTitles.en: Favela Comic Artist

description.en:
Comic artist Takei Hiroto, who was rejected once again at a serialization meeting, decided to give up on his dream and go on a heartbroken trip to Brazil to get over everything.

In a favela (slum) he accidentally wandered into, Hiroto meets a poor boy with sharp eyes named João. Living on the exact opposite side of the Earth, João surprisingly has a dream of becoming a mangaka (Japanese comic artist)…!!

No matter who you are or where you live, you don’t have to give up. The story of two slums comic artists chasing their dreams begins!!

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

title.en: Sake no Tabako no Hiyatoi Dungeon

altTitles.en: Day labor dungeon of alcohol and cigarettes

altTitles.ja: 酒と煙草の日雇いダンジョン

description.en: The story follows a pair of adventurers: one who is an alcoholic and one who is a heavy smoker. The two enter ancient dungeons to embark on bounty hunting and house-hunting. -ANN

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: きみとピコピコ

altTitles.en: You & Picopico
You & Bleep Bloop

description.en: Oota, an otaku, joined the game club to live his ideal high school life. That was when he met by chance the freshman gal, Ageha Onisaki!! They dive straight into playing video games, but Ageha's choices are the Famicom (NES), the Super Famicom (SNES), and the Megadrive (Sega Genesis)! Who the heck is this person!? Playing a wide range from famous to retro games, the gal and the otaku start their heart-throbbing life!
description.pt-br: Oota, um otaku, ingressou no clube de jogos para viver sua vida ideal de colegial. Foi quando ele conheceu por acaso a caloura Ageha Onisaki!! Eles mergulham direto nos videogames, mas as escolhas de Ageha são NES, SNES e Megadora! Quem diabos é essa garota!? Jogando uma ampla variedade de jogos retrôs famosos, gal e o otaku começam sua agitada vida juntos!

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス

description.en:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: モンスターセラピー！　カラダの悩み、この子たちにお任せください

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: Ousamatachi no Viking
王様達のヴァイキング

description.en: 18-year-old Koreeda Kazuki is a genius hacker whose only real skill lies with computers. Into his aimless life steps a wealthy man who makes him a proposition he finds impossible to refuse: that he will become Koreeda's investor on the condition that Koreeda use his abilities to help the man "conquer the world." In cyberspace where national borders hold no meaning, thus begins the story of two modern-day adventurers who stand against crime on a global scale.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: From Acting Genius To Top Idol!

altTitles.en: Acting Genius, TOP Idol!

description.en: “The brilliant actor, famous Baekhyun, before he dies, encounters a miracle and travels back in time! But there’s nothing free about time travel. His lifespan ends at thirty, and he has only ten years left. To return as an actor and stay alive, he must become an ‘idol’! Experience the journey of the talented performance star as he rises to the top ranks of idols, an exciting story awaits!”

altTitles.en: Extreme Cold War
Frozen Frontiers
Chronicles of the Polar War

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

altTitles.en: Placebo Memories

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

title.en: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.ja: ハーレムより平穏を！異世界で静かにニート姫させてくれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Harem Yori Heion wo! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.en: More peace than a harem
More Peace than a Harem - In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace
I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World

description.en:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
description.ja:
エリートサラリーマン（ニート志望）、姫様にTS転生してオナ●ート生活…!!!?

ニートを夢見てFIREをした、エリートサラリーマン・岸辺。夢の生活も目前!!のはずが、車にひかれる寸前だった女の子を助けたことで死亡してしまう。そんな彼を憐れんだ自称神様が岸辺をニートができる異世界へと転生。気づけば超大国の姫様・アイリスになっていた!!!
超絶美少女で一切働く必要がなく、惰眠と自由とオナ●ーのし放題で岸辺は人生勝ち組!!…と確信していたが、ある問題が。この姫様、最高レベルの愛され体質（スキル？）みたいで、色々な女の子が姫様（元男）に迫られまくり……!!?


異世界で愛されまくって働かないメシが上手いか？を体験できる、羨ましすぎる異世界TSクソニートハーレム!!!!

altTitles.ja: ぼくとミモザの75日

altTitles.en: 75 Days of Me and Mimosa

description.en: Rindou Shuuto is the son of Yakuza boss Rindou Takeshi, the brutal and voracious head of the Rindou-gumi. Takeshi is likewise a heartless and abusive parent, very much angered by his son's timid nature, but Shuuto finds comfort in the companionship of his new bodyguard, the beautiful and mysterious Mimosa; whom he dubs as his "older sister". Later though, Shuuto walks in on his father apparently forcing himself onto Mimosa. Reaching his limit, Shuuto violently attacks his father with a knife, but it's Mimosa who swiftly finishes off the crime lord, protecting the young man. The two proceed to go on the run together....

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 美しいばけもの

altTitles.en: The Beautiful Deity

description.en:
The “Great God” is a god who takes the form of a beast and is said to bestow “blessings” on the land he visits.

A village in the mountains, where the tradition still exists, was suffering from heavy snowfall that never stops throughout the year. The residents believe that this is due to a lack of offerings to the “Great God,” so they make a decision.

They decided to offer a “slave boy” to the “Great God” as a “human sacrifice”....

A story of “boy” and “beast,” “blessing” and “curse.
description.ja:
獣の姿をして、訪れた土地に“祝福”を授けるとされる神、“大神様”。

その伝承が残る山間の集落は、一年中降りやむことのない豪雪に苦しめられていた。“大神様”への供物が足りないためだと考えた住民はとある決断を下す。

それは“奴隷の少年”を“人身御供”として、“大神様”へ差し出すことだった…。

“少年”と“獣”、そして“祝福”と“呪い”の物語。

altTitles.ja: 絶代武神～伝説の始まり～

description.en:
On the verge of death, I was saved by a group of elderly demon – level existences at the apex of cultivation. But I, Yeon-gang had too much potential in martial arts, and alas was kidnapped and forced to become their disciple… Join me as I desperately try my best to escape their grasp, and enter the world of Murim!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ja:
武林世家である四川唐門でこき使われあげくに捨てられた少年・燕康。 自称「絶世達人」の老人3人組に拾われ弟子になるも、修行と言う名の家事ばかり！ やっと武功を教えてもらうことになるも、基本の以気御剣（いきごけん）”さえできなかった！ 武神の伝説は始まったばかり…！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ko:
은거고수 삼인방 비돈, 독안, 광두! 

그들이 제자를 키우기 시작한다.

"너는 왜 가장 기본인 이기어검조차 못하냐?"


기본이나 다름없는 이기어검도 못해서 구박받는 제자 소연강!

소연강과 세사부의 전설이 시작된다!

적하 작가의 명작 무협 소설 <절대무신>이 웹툰으로 돌아왔다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ru:
Три великих мастера-затворника: Бидон, Тоган и Кванду, - взяли на воспитание ученика по имени Со Ён Ган.

-Почему ты не можешь освоить элементарные приёмы с мечом?

Вот так начинается история об ученике-неудачнике - Со Ён Гане.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)

title.en: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo, Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in Another World, But For Some Reason No One Wants to Leave.

altTitles.ja: 異世界で孤児院を開いたけど、なぜか誰一人巣立とうとしない件

altTitles.ru: Как открыть приют в другом мире!

altTitles.en: Isekai Orphanage

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 고아원을 열었지만, 어째서인지 아무도 독립하려 하지 않는다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开了孤儿院，但不知为何没有一个人想离开

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Kojiin wo hiraitakedo nazeka darehitori sudatou to shinaiken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in a Different World, But Why Doesn't Anyone Want to Graduate?

description.en: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?
description.id: Masatsugu dibawa ke dunia lain dalam panggilan pahlawan dan akhirnya menjadi bagian dari kasta terendah. anak ini, yang tidak memiliki apa-apa selain keterampilan dasar, disuruh mengelola panti asuhan penuh gadis-gadis cantik! Tapi, hari-hari menyebalkan nya baru saja di mulai ketika ia menemukan bangunan di reruntuhan, dan ia juga harus membayar utang besar mantan direktur! Dan tidak itu saja, dia tidak punya waktu untuk beristirahat dari semua sampah mengancam panti asuhan! Apakah Masatsugu dan para anak yatim bisa melindungi rumah mereka yang berharga?

description.en:
“Those wearing armor shall never take off their arms, will never die, and will live in pain.”

With a witch’s curse, the ‘Cursed Knights’ began to roam the world.

And Enoch, a boy who encounters one, is about to discover what happens to him.

altTitles.en: Human Card

altTitles.ja: 人間カード

description.en: Mamoru, a mediocre college student, discovers an item of darkness while searching for the missing father of his childhood friend, Yuuka. This item is a "human card" which can trap people on a single sheet of paper for buying and selling. The horrific human trading suspense now begins!

altTitles.en: Cage on the Water
Mates Above the Waters

description.ko:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

altTitles.en: Beast King & Medicinal Herb

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

title.en: Hanabi wa Samenai Yume wo miru

altTitles.ja: 花火は醒めない夢をみる

altTitles.en: Olivia and the Neverending Dream

description.en: Olivia, the daughter of a duke, is betrayed by her fiancé, Crown Prince Luke, and is publicly executed. However, the moment Olivia thinks she has lost her life, she wakes up as Hanabi, a high school girl in a different world: Japan. What's more, it seems that Hanabi is being bullied at school...? The story of a duke's daughter's rise to power is about to begin!
description.ja:
公爵令嬢が転生したらいじめられっ子JKだった件。
婚約者・ルークに裏切られ、公開処刑となったオリビア。…のはずが目が覚めるとそこは異世界で、女子高生・鏑木花火になっていた！ 花火は皆からいじめられていたようで、学校に行くとクラスから標的にされてしまう。しかもそこに現れたのは、ルークに瓜二つのクラスメイト・押野で…？

---
被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！
description.zh-hk: 被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！

description.en:
Rin Ishikawa, 16 years old, the "talent'' that will revolutionize the boxing world has begun to awaken in the north.

Rin is a very popular and mischievous person. He was raised by his mother and grandparents in a small town in Hokkaido.

Now, he has dropped out of high school and is about to embark on his journey.
Without thiniking about his future, he decide to go to Tokyo. 

Rin, little did he know that he would leave his name in the history of boxing.
